All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hamcrest.Matcher<Throwable>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing
public class CausedBy
extends org.hamcrest.CustomTypeSafeMatcher<Throwable>

Matcher to search stacktrace of exception if it get caused by a given exception somewhere.

Since:
8/28/12
